name: NSTextAttachmentLayout
desc: A set of methods that define the interface to attachment objects from a text layout manager.

items.name: func attachmentBounds(for: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any], location: NSTextLocation, textContainer: NSTextContainer?, proposedLineFragment: CGRect, position: CGPoint) -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the layout bounds of the attachment you specify.

items.name: func image(for: CGRect, attributes: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any], location: NSTextLocation, textContainer: NSTextContainer?) -> UIImage?
items.desc: Returns the image object rendered at the bounds and inside the text container you specify.

items.name: func viewProvider(for: UIView?, location: NSTextLocation, textContainer: NSTextContainer?) -> NSTextAttachmentViewProvider?
items.desc: Returns the text attachment view provider corresponding to the file type.
